Description: UID for this tree
Tree family
Genus, species, variety, other taxa
A common name for this tree (only one name)
Visible tree tag Y/N
Tag ID number, if tagged
Is the tree alive?
Diameter at breast height in cm
Height from ground to top(alive or dead) of tree in meters
Height from ground to the live top of tree in meters
Height from ground to base of live crown in meters
Crown width (shortest) in meters
Crown width (longest) in meters
Percent of crown volume that is not occupied by branches or leaves
Number of sides (inc above) tree receives light from
Number of stems
Team that did the data collection
General tree type (Coniferous, Evergreen, Deciduous)
Date the non-ID tree meauserments were taken
Year tree taxa/name and location collected
Height of tree in meters derived from lidar
The error range of the tree height, based on the range of ground elevations
General notes about the tree (such as class/memorial tree).
